name: Running Little Witch
description:
You play as a witch who is looking for the Heart of the Forest. She can merge with ghosts that give her powers. The game is a runner.

Controls: w, a, s, d, alpha1, alpha2, space

«The game was created while participating in the ScoreSpace Jam #14 «Merge»

Programmer: @KinGelaim

Narrative design, voice acting: @sophiethecesar

Audio, graphics: Free Assets
